sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import productData from "../productData"; import PageTitle from "../../../../layouts/PageTitle"; const ProductDetail = ({ match }) => { //** Dynamic Key Single Place */ const singleProductData = productData.find((sinPl) => sinPl.key === match.params.id ? match.params.id : productData[0].key ); const { previewImg, rating, price, availability, productCode, brand, tags, des, imageList, } = singleProductData; return (
    {imageList.map((images, i) => (
    • ))}

Availability:{" "} {availability}{" "}

Brand: {brand}

); }; export default ProductDetail;
